2131.subject: MPA
2131.descrlong: The course will introduce students to basic techniques in the art of acting, involving practical work in voice, movement, and performance skills. Initial exercises will focus on the individual student's creative process then explore its application to the work of the group. The study of acting has something for everyone in terms of rediscovering the power of one's imagination, learning how to work effectively with others, and appreciating the craft of performance.
